briefTitle: Lymphedema Prevention After Lymph Node Emptying
officialTitle: Effectiveness of Lymphedema Prevention Programs After Lymph Node Emptying in Breast Cancer: A Randomized Clinical Trial
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Having undergone a lymph node dissection as part of treatment for primary breast neoplasm
* Acceptance of the study conditions and signing of the informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Tumour recurrences
* Metastatic cancer
* Open wounds or loss of skin integrity
* Dependency or deterioration of higher functions
* Arterial insufficiency and deep vein thrombosis
* Acute heart failure
* Severe peripheral neuropathy
* Lymphedema
